hooks.command: filepath=$(echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" | jq -r '.file_path // .filePath // empty'); if [ -n "$filepath" ] && echo "$filepath" | grep -qE '\.(env|pem|key|crt|p12|pfx)$'; then echo 'BLOCK: Sensitive file type - manual edit required'; exit 2; fi
cmd=$(echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" | jq -r '.command // empty'); if echo "$cmd" | grep -qE 'rm\s+-rf\s+[~/]|git\s+push.*--force|npm\s+publish'; then echo 'BLOCK: Dangerous command pattern'; exit 2; fi

filepath=$(echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" | jq -r '.file_path // .filePath // empty'); if [ -n "$filepath" ] && echo "$filepath" | grep -qE '\.ts$'; then npx prettier --write "$filepath" 2>/dev/null || true; fi
